label: Description
value: Alternation of four S-curving vines (two bamboo-like; two seaweed-like). Each vine sends out shoots alternately left and right. Textile would have been used as a dress fabric and was probably inspired by a European woven silk.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush; madder dyed; blue applied over resist; yellow applied by brush (chintz) on plain weave

value: Scattered floral sprigs and birds. Indian adaptation of European pattern. As design is hand drawn repeat is irregular.

value: Medium: cotton Technique: mordant painted and dyed (chintz) on plain weave
